I start my career with only FAR installed. Every time I try to pitch("w"or"s"), its a gambling. The vessel reacts randomly, unpredictable. Sometimes no mattter W or S, it just pitch up. I screw a lot of missions. So I guess its JB's fault. But I even get the same problem with MJ!!! Help!! The problem even exist in scenarios!!!

Edited January 19, 2016 by cmdr woosy

It highly depend of craft design. You might found better answer about craft design in official FAR craft repository thread.
Also, you might find usefull tips in my thread how to read FAR graphs that can help you trough craft design process.

Links for both threads are in my signarure.

I've also had a problem with pitching in FAR, where both w and s pitch up fully. It isn't a craft issue as the pitch control guage thing goes to the top with either key pressed or the pitch axis of a joystick changed, and also occurs with the stock rocket VTOl trainer. No idea how to fix, sorry.
